body_content.explanation: in the Star Wars series of films, a member of a group of fighters who are trained to protect and help others, who use special swords called lightsabres, and who have some special mental powers:
examples: Remember you are a Jedi. You are here to observe and to help where you can.
He wielded the stick like it was a lightsabre, pretending to be a Jedi knight.

body_content.explanation: a philosophy based on the beliefs of the Jedi characters in the Star Wars films:
examples: A number of people recorded their religion as "Jedi" on the official census.

body_content.explanation: a person who follows a philosophy based on the beliefs of the Jedi characters in the Star Wars films:
examples: Jedis are very welcome to shop in our stores although we would ask them to remove their hoods.
